de.ityx.mediatrix.data.base

Class Lock

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.mediatrix.data.base.Lock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Lock
extends Object
implements Serializable
    It's used to avoid simultaneous processing of the eMails of the different operators. For this purpose the functions are like release and lock reserved.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Lock

        public Lock(int type,
    int id,
    boolean flag,
    boolean external_forwarding_temp_flag,
    boolean external_status_changed)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        type - an object type PROJECT, SUBPROJECT, CASE, ... .
        id - an object unique id ( e.g. Project.getId(), Subproject.getId(), ... )
        flag - true if the lock is to be set ( SET_LOCK ), false if the lock is to be released ( RELEASE_LOCK )
        external_forwarding_temp_flag - true if the temp status is Question.EXTERNAL_FORWARDING_TEMP_FLAG, false otherwise
        external_status_changed - true if the temp status is Question.EXTERNAL_STATUS_CHANGED, false otherwise

      • Lock

        public Lock(int type,
    int id,
    boolean flag,
    boolean external_forwarding_temp_flag)
        Constructor. see Lock(int, int, boolean, boolean, boolean)

        The parameter external_status_changed is false as default.

      • Lock

        public Lock(int type,
    int id,
    boolean flag)
        Constructor. see Lock(int, int, boolean, boolean, boolean)

        The parameter external_forwarding_temp_flag is false as default.
        The parameter external_status_changed is false as default.

      • isNoReportUpdate

        public boolean isNoReportUpdate()
        Sets the flag whether the operator state like operator pause entry must be inserted. Used for a report with operator inactivity.
        Returns:
        true if the data aren't to be inserted, false otherwise

      • setNoReportUpdate

        public void setNoReportUpdate(boolean noReportUpdate)
        Gets the flag whether the operator state like operator pause entry must be inserted. Used for a report with operator inactivity.
        Parameters:
        noReportUpdate - true if the data aren't to be inserted, false otherwise
